ygData.subject: Re: Cast force
ygData.msgSnippet: According to eq.stratics.com Cast Force is indeed a direct damage spell with 2 second stun.  Now they  have been wrong in the past but I figured I would add
ygData.messageBody:
According to eq.stratics.com Cast Force is indeed a direct damage spell with
2 second stun. Now they have been wrong in the past but I figured I would
add some fuel to the fire. =)

I would really like to know what is the deal with this spells so I know if I
want to research it or not. I have found most non-direct spells fairly
worthless unless you are going up against several green mobs.

As for the insulting back talk part, we will see, I don't consider
contradicting someone as insulting especially if that person is right. =)

-- Elidain of the Veeshan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: cnj005@... [mailto:cnj005@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 8:59 AM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Cast force
>
>
> From: cnj005@...
>
> Level 24
>
> Cast Force
>
> This is a magic based offensive spell.
>
> If in fact this is the spell you speak of then I beg you to
> go out and attempt to cast it upon a single target from a
> distance.. If infact I was at all incorrect in stating it was
> an AE spell then the mistake was that it is a PB spell not an
> AE spell and certainly not a DD spell.
>
> I’ll forgive your insulting back talk for the moment, as I
> imagine you must be human and have little knowledge of this subject.
>
> Innoruuk be with you and may he bring suffering upon yer soul;
> Demistraties Stro’Various Dark army of Darkmoon
>
>
> From: "Tony Cawthorne" <tac1@...>
>
> Cast Force is a DD spell NOT an AE
>
> Quindinar
>
